author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

I.e. repeat #43310 on PortableMultiCollection (that was added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40285).


#### PR validation:

Unit tests run.
title: Simplify definition of `PortableMultiCollection<TDev, ...>`, and allow it to be used outside of `ALPAKA_ACCELERATOR_NAMESPACE`
